derivation.yuyuan_name: late 18th cent.: modern Latin, from Greek platupous 'flat-footed', from platus 'flat' + pous 'foot'

means.word_mean: 1. small densely furred aquatic monotreme of Australia and Tasmania having a broad bill and tail and webbed feet; only species in the family Ornithorhynchidae
